means: 迷人的，有极大吸引力的

sentence.Network_en: The list of drinks, a dozen pages long, makes fascinating reading.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒水单一共有十几页长，读起来很有趣。

sentence.Network_en: I still find this story both fascinating and unbelievable.
sentence.Network_cn: 我仍觉得这个故事既有趣又不太可信。

sentence.Network_en: What happens when the two interests collide will make a fascinating spectacle.
sentence.Network_cn: 两种利益发生冲突时将会上演一场好戏。

职称英语A级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... fantastical a. 奇异的；异想天开的 fascinate v. 迷住，强烈的吸引 fascination n. 迷惑力；迷恋.

entry.tran: 迷人的;让人着迷的;极有吸引力的
entry.def: If you describe something as fascinating, you find it very interesting and attractive, and your thoughts tend to concentrate on it.

example.ex: Madagascar is the most fascinating place I have ever been to...
example.tran: 马达加斯加是我去过的最迷人的地方。

example.ex: Her perceptions and intuitions about human nature were fascinating.
example.tran: 她对人性的理解和感知引人入胜。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of arousing and holding the attention;
2. capturing interest as if by a spell;

auth_sentence.content: This is a fascinating, moving, beautiful record.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a fascinating, moving, beautiful record.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a fascinating, moving, beautiful record.

auth_sentence.content: Whatever Palomo does next, it should be fascinating.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whatever Palomo does next, it should be fascinating.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whatever Palomo does next, it should be fascinating.

auth_sentence.content: These facts were fascinating to me, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: These facts were fascinating to me, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These facts were fascinating to me, he says.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: excite使兴奋+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.令人兴奋的,使人激动的
exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flatter阿谀,奉承+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
forego居先+ing……的→adj.在前的,前述的
hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的
increase增加+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.日益增加的,增大的
inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest使发生兴趣,引起……的注意+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
invite邀请+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.诱人的,引人入胜的
out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
precede先于+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.在前的,前述的
promise允许,答应+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有希望的,有前途的
refresh使清新+ing令人……的→adj.使心神爽快的
rivet铆钉,固定+ing正……的或令人……的→如铆钉一样把人钉[吸引]住→非常精彩的
threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 欠缺的,没有的,不够格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: want想+ing……的→想要的→欠缺的
account计算+ing状态物品,行业等→n.会计学
advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
bank银行+ing状态物品,行业等→n.银行业
begin开始,首先+ing状态→n.开始
build建造+ing物→n.建筑[物],房屋,大楼 [同]structure
cloth布+ing物→n.服装,被褥
dance跳舞+ing状态物品,行业等→dancing舞蹈
engineer工程师+ing状态物品,行业等→n.工程[学]
feel感觉+ing状态→n.感情;心情;知觉;同情
fill填充+ing状态物品,行业等→n.充填物,馅
fish鱼+ing状态物品,行业等→n.钓鱼,捕鱼
floor地板+ing物→n.地板材料,铺地板

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立足处;稳固的地位,基础
stems_affixes.word_buile: foot足+ing状态物品,行业等→立足点
gloam变朦胧+ing状态物品,行业等→n.黄昏,薄暮
greet问候+ing状态物品,行业等→n.祝贺,问候
handwrite书法;笔迹+ing状态物品,行业等→n.笔迹,书写体,书法,笔势
happen发生+ing状态→n. 事件,意外发生的事
know知道+ing状态→n.知晓;认知
learn学习+ing状态物品,行业等→n.知识,学问;学习
leg腿+ing状态物品,行业等→legging绑腿
moor停船+ing状态物品,行业等→n.停泊处
open开+ing状态物品,行业等→n.开,开放,开始
shoe鞋+make制造+ing状态物品,行业等→n.制鞋修补皮鞋
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
proceed进行+ing正……的或令人……的→行动,进行
age年龄+ing状态→n.成熟,变老
consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及
fail错,失败+ing在……情况下……→prep.如果没有……
regard注视+ing在……情况下……→与……相关→关于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及

Sentence.sentence: I really like these old episodes of "The Twilight Zone" because the stories are fascinating.
In addition to saving lives, informative speakers help people learn new skills, solve problems and acquire fascinating facts about the exciting world in which they live.
But what is so fascinating is how a book changes during the process of writing.

means.word_mean: 迷人的, 有极大吸引力的

sentences.en: The changing vivid colours of the sunset are really fascinating.
sentences.cn: 日落时变化多端的色彩确实使人心醉神迷。

sentences.en: Your ideas are fascinating to me.
sentences.cn: 你的这些主意对我来说是有吸引力的。

jushi.english: I'll never forget the fascinating old shops and alleys with the dust of another century upon them.
jushi.chinese: 我永远也忘不了那蒙着另一个世纪的尘土,富有魅力的古老的商店和胡同。

jushi.english: Westminster Abbey towering in the distance there provides a fascinating view.
jushi.chinese: 矗立在远处的西敏寺构成了一处迷人的景色。

jushi.english: The changing vivid colors of the sunset are really fascinating.
jushi.chinese: 日落时变化多端的色彩确实使人心醉神迷。
